channel.title: Recovered by someone?
channel.description:
So my main got recovered by someone and they somehow glitched my account by changing my email and recovery questions within HOURS! So now I've sent an email to Jagex's parent inbox and have tried many attempted recoverys with no avail. If someone HAS a contact within Jagex or knows a way I can get my account back it will BE GREATLY appreciated and I will GIVE you a reward of some sort. (Paypal, RSGP, whatever you need).
P.S: I think they may of had the account wiped via a post on the forums.
Thanks guys.

item.title: Recovered by someone?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:13, topic:388793”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=484615.msg3551209#msg3551209 date=1301535038]

The account HAD over 300M and I had spend over 3 YEARS in-game time training him and I have no idea how they did it! I mean, I should just be able to recover the account because of my IP, but… I have no idea how it works.

Just make sure to do a account recovery and hit 4/5 recovery sections. You will most likely get it back but don’t expect your money

Also it took Jagex 2815 days for them to give me my account back…(might scare you :P)

I’ve done so many recovery requests that my IP has been banned for 12 hours. Yes, 12 hours.
[/quote]
Same lol.[/quote]
I received a message on the recovery page like “only recover accounts that are owned by yourself”.
…Really jagex?

Read full topic

item.title: Recovered by someone?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

My account has everything… yoyo,sythe,ears. I met someone wanting to buy an account with ears for 150$. Now, please, back on topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovered by someone?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Lol 200$ for un-tradeables, no thanks.
If that was the case, my account would be over 1500$

Read full topic

item.title: Recovered by someone?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Well let’s calculate.
Sell all your gold for 1$/M so 1x300=300 and I’d say about… 40$ for a 99 so… 40x5=200. My quests and other un-tradeables i’d add about around 200$, so about 700$. I would say.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovered by someone?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:4, topic:388793”]I just lost my level 132 to a “friend”, he had over 500mil.
Deal.[/quote]
132 is over 500$ and the 500mil is 500$
You’re account isn’t work more than 500$ at the most, and that’s with alot of 99’s

Read full topic
